comment:
"Катсцена - с БТР-а слуги игрока раздают окружившей их толпе пайки
Слуга"

languages.text: "Узрите щедрость нового Вольного Торговца! Каждому по три пайка и топливный ресурс!"

traits.locale_text: "Узрите щедрость нового Вольного Торговца! Каждому по три пайка и топливный ресурс!"

languages.text: "Behold the generosity of the new Rogue Trader! Everyone gets three rations and a fuel resource!"
languages.original_text: "Узрите щедрость нового Вольного Торговца! Каждому по три пайка и топливный ресурс!"

traits.locale_text: "Behold the generosity of the new Rogue Trader! Everyone gets three rations and a fuel resource!"
"Behold the generosity of the new Rogue Trader! Everyone gets three rations and a fuel resource!"
"Behold the generosity of the new Rogue Trader! Everyone gets three rations and a fuel resource!"
"Behold the generosity of the new Rogue Trader! Everyone gets three rations and a fuel resource!"
"Behold the generosity of the new Rogue Trader! Everyone gets three rations and a fuel resource!"

languages.text: 「新しい自由開拓者の深きお心を見よ！全員に配給3つと燃料資源1個が与えられる！」
languages.original_text: "Behold the generosity of the new Rogue Trader! Everyone gets three rations and a fuel resource!"

traits.locale_text: 「新しい自由開拓者の深きお心を見よ！全員に配給3つと燃料資源1個が与えられる！」

languages.text: “看看新任行商浪人是如何慷慨解囊的！每人足足发了三份口粮，还有一份燃料！”
languages.original_text: "Behold the generosity of the new Rogue Trader! Everyone gets three rations and a fuel resource!"

traits.locale_text: “看看新任行商浪人是如何慷慨解囊的！每人足足发了三份口粮，还有一份燃料！”

languages.text: «¡Contemplad la generosidad de{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente! ¡Todo el mundo recibirá tres raciones y combustible!».
languages.original_text: "Behold the generosity of the new Rogue Trader! Everyone gets three rations and a fuel resource!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Contemplad la generosidad de{mf|l| la} nuev{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente! ¡Todo el mundo recibirá tres raciones y combustible!».

languages.text: « Remerciez la générosité {mf|du nouveau libre-marchand|de la nouvelle libre-marchande} ! Il y a des rations et du carburant pour tout le monde ! »
languages.original_text: "Behold the generosity of the new Rogue Trader! Everyone gets three rations and a fuel resource!"

traits.locale_text: « Remerciez la générosité {mf|du nouveau libre-marchand|de la nouvelle libre-marchande} ! Il y a des rations et du carburant pour tout le monde ! »

languages.text: "Seht doch, wie großzügig {mf|der neue Freihändler|die neue Freihändlerin} ist! Alle erhalten drei Rationen und einen Treibstoffvorrat!"
languages.original_text: "Behold the generosity of the new Rogue Trader! Everyone gets three rations and a fuel resource!"

traits.locale_text: "Seht doch, wie großzügig {mf|der neue Freihändler|die neue Freihändlerin} ist! Alle erhalten drei Rationen und einen Treibstoffvorrat!"

languages.text: "Yeni Hür Tacir'in cömertliğini görmeyen, duymayan kalmasın! Herkese üç paket kumanyayla bir adet yakıt kaynağı dağıtılacak!"
languages.original_text: "Behold the generosity of the new Rogue Trader! Everyone gets three rations and a fuel resource!"

traits.locale_text: "Yeni Hür Tacir'in cömertliğini görmeyen, duymayan kalmasın! Herkese üç paket kumanya ve bir adet yakıt kaynağı dağıtılacak!"
